Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダの人たちは どうなったんだろう……
Entry.EnglishText: What happened to the people of Razilda...?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだな……花屋の娘とか イゴルとか大丈夫かな……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah... I wonder if the flower girl and Igor are okay...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……無事だといいけど…… 病気の子供のいるお婆さんとかも……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope they're safe... There was also that old lady with the sick child...

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍が動いていれば、 救出されているだろうが……
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps the army moved to evacuate them, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 時間ができたら…… 連中の無事を確かめに行きたいな……
Entry.EnglishText: If we have the time... I'd like to make sure that they're all safe...
